description: Detects the execution of format.com with a suspicious filesystem selection that could indicate a defense evasion activity in which format.com is used to load malicious DLL files or other programs
author: Florian Roth
name: Format.com FileSystem LOLBIN
query: ((process.executable.text:*\\format.com AND process.command_line.text:*\/fs\:*) AND (NOT process.command_line.text:(*\/fs\:FAT* OR *\/fs\:exFAT* OR *\/fs\:NTFS* OR *\/fs\:UDF* OR *\/fs\:ReFS*)))
